body_html:
1. I have found a good solution to circumvent that problem.
  2. Great :)
  3. For now I am using two plain Estimators for both the pretraining of generator and discriminator. Let me know when you come up with a better solution for that problem :)

body:
1. I have found a good solution to circumvent that problem.
2. Great :)
3. For now I am using two plain `Estimator`s for both the pretraining of generator and discriminator.  Let me know when you come up with a better solution for that problem :)
